description:
Full Stack Fest is coming on Sept 1-5 2015, an international programming event in Barcelona held over week, divided in two two-day single-track conferences: Barcelona Ruby Conference and Barcelona Future JS.

Join us on http://www.fullstackfest.com

Direction & Animation - Morphika (http://www.morphika.tv/)
Sound - Pere Tió, Xevi Collado
title: Full Stack Fest 2015 - Teaser
